text:
reasonably timely manner. Thanks again for everything!
Message 1506 of 4024
Are you just too busy? This is pretty important.
I’m trying to be polite and cooperative. All weekend for that matter after an awful last week. But you knew I had privileges again. So I’m struggling
why you would block this conversation on his last day of winter break.
I want to give you the benefit of the doubt, but what event on your social calendar today is so incredibly important that you can’t just poke your head
in on the behalf of Adrian and I after Dr Brown’s approval?
I really hope it was a hell of a hot date.
Sent:02/19/2024 at 05:21 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/20/2024 at 05:56 AM)
Subject:Re: Dr Brown
Message 1507 of 4024
Please accept my apologies. I am sure you are doing your best. Thank you !
Sent:02/19/2024 at 05:44 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/19/2024 at 05:55 PM)
Subject:Re: Dr Brown
Message 1508 of 4024
You are correct I was actually working today. It was an intense session today so pivoting back and focusing is what I did. I was not aware Dr Brown
would suggest that.
Apologies accepted.
That last comment was inappropriate given what I manage on a day to day basis especially given the intensity of it all.
It demonstrates to me you are only able to hold in your comments and behavior until you can’t.
Sent:02/19/2024 at 07:17 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/19/2024 at 07:17 PM)
Subject:Re: Dr Brown
Message 1509 of 4024
So apologies not accepted?
Sent:02/19/2024 at 07:18 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/20/2024 at 05:52 AM)
Subject:Re: Dr Brown
